### City Hall

104 E. Adams Street, PO Box 1200

Connell, WA 99326-1200

Phone: (509) 234-2701

[cityofconnell@connellwa.org](mailto:cityofconnell@connellwa.org)

### Office Hours

Monday - Thursday from 7:00am - 5:00pm

City offices are closed on all Federal holidays
